awd_titl_txt: TRP: An ATM Interoperability Testbed for the National       Information Infrastructure
awd_abstract_narration: NCR-9520963  Kenneth Young    Bellcore, Tektronix, the Joint Interoperability Test Command  (JITC), and the University of Pennsylvania will implement an ATM  Interoperability Testbed to develop tools, procedures, and  standards that promote interoperability among ATM products.  The  project will include three key areas of ATM technology for the  development of interoperability testing systems.  These areas are  1) ATM signaling Interoperability, 2) ATM traffic management  interoperability, and 3) higher-layer protocol interoperability.  These areas are chosen because standards for signaling, traffic  management and higher layer protocols (e.g. Internet Protocol- IP)  as they related to ATM are maturing rapidly and will be implemented  in products in a time frame that is consistent with this project's  research and development.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
